qas.question: What resulted from Europe's exploration of the New World?
What institution of mercantilism was established with New World colonies?
What replaced agriculture as the focus of European economy with the establishment of overseas colonies?
Aside from the activities of colonies, what other event fostered the transition from agriculture to manufacturing?

answers.text: the Industrial Revolution of Great Britain

qas.question: What resulted from Europe's Columbian exchange?
What institution of mercantilism was established with Great Britain?
What replaced colonial empires as the focus of European economy with the establishment of overseas colonies?

plausible_answers.text: the Industrial Revolution of Great Britain

qas.question: Aside from the activities of colonies what other even fostered the transition from manufacturing to agriculture?

plausible_answers.text: resource inflows from the New World and the Industrial Revolution

qas.question: What allowed a new economy based on subsistence agriculture?

The combination of <b8_0>resource inflows from the New World and <a3_0><b7_0>the Industrial Revolution<b8_0/> of Great Britain<b7_0/><a3_0/>, allowed a new economy based on <a2_0><b6_0>manufacturing<b6_0/><a2_0/> instead of subsistence agriculture.
